posts.author: jpsweeney94
posts.content:
Hello all, hope I'm posting in the right place. Im looking for a Paladin/WM high smite damage build for the PW I play. I assume I will also want to do CoT? How much in either direction? Don't really know the ins and outs of paladin and CoT. 

Desired Build: 7 levels of WM and the rest in pally and/or CoT // Epic Build level 40
Weapon: Scythe
Focus: High smite and crit damage, but not at the expense of being a complete glass cannon. So not 100% set on getting up to smite 10, unless feasible. If possible, id also like to be able to cast all paladin spells... so 14 wisdom I believe? 
Race: Human, but willing to adjust if necessary.

Some things to note about the PW I play in is that we mostly do PvM.. not really much PvP so my focus will be against NPC bosses and fairly large mobs. Usually traveling with at least 1 or 2 party members sometimes larger, but id like the ability to play on my own as well. AC is somewhat important so like I said, can't completely ignore those benefits. 
Here's a list of some of the gear I will have to give you an idea of what stats I will be able to max etc... (I believe I can do up to +12 on any stat from items). But I have plenty of other options available:

Scythe 
1d10 negative
1d6 sonic vs Elf
1d6 positive vs human
EB +4

+6 soak 5

Don't want to go on and on with items so just to summarize I can also get an ammy with +5 AC and elemental resistances; belts/helmets with improved evasion, immunity to knockdown, damage resistances; rings with immunity to death magic, mind affecting, ability increases etc. Generally speaking I should have no problem maxing out up to 2 ability scores with items... and a decent amount in other abilities. Please let me know if you need more details!

Thanks! :)
